name: BattleDead
description:
It's 2037, and the world has been segregated into different districts. A virus set loose nearly five years ago caused mayhem throughout the world. Each district contains a segregated population of the infected. You're part of the WDET (World Defence Extermination Team) and are placed in District 11, with the sole job of exterminating any virus threat that's found within the district. District 11 is known for being completely shut down to the outside world, with the level of infection relatively high. The last team that went in weren't sure if the people there were alive or dead. For the world to get back to any normality, you must clean up the district.

ALTHOUGH WE STATE NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT, PLAYER IS CONTROLLABLE WITH A GAMEPAD CONTROLLER.

Survive wave after wave of the infected, destroying as many as possible.

key Features


Choose from 5 different game modes (with/without pickups, day maps/night maps and health pickup optons)

Pick from a selection of 8 different starting weapons, all providing different areas of play.

Play Online Multiplayer, providing support for teams of 4 players in each lobby.
